p: The use of different mulches is becoming popular in wake of sustainable agriculture [ 50, 51, 58]. Sorghum mulches have been successfully used to suppress the germination and growth of several weed species [ 56, 57, 60]. The applied mulched significantly reduced seedling emergence of the populations included in the study. Thus, deep burial, shallow tillage and application of sorghum mulches could be successfully used to manage the species in agricultural habitats.
